media.headline: Rosales scores on error
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Rosales races home on Trout's fielding error
media.bigblurb: Adam Rosales races home from first base after Mike Trout misplays a ball and it rolls to the wall in the 3rd inning

media.headline: Healy's two-run homer
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Healy crushes a two-run homer to left field
media.bigblurb: Ryon Healy crushes a two-run home run to deep left-center field to give the Athletics a 4-1 lead in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Angels challenge out at second
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Revere out at second after call stands
media.bigblurb: Ben Revere is called out at second base on a throw from Marcus Semien, and the call stands after the Angels challenge in the top of the 6th

media.headline: Plouffe's RBI single
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Plouffe rips an RBI single to center field
media.bigblurb: Trevor Plouffe lines a single to center field to score Khris Davis and extend the Athletics' lead to 5-1 in the bottom of the 6th inning

media.headline: Young fan throws ball away
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Dad gives daughter ball, she throws it away
media.bigblurb: Mark Canha hits a foul ball that is caught by a fan who gives it to his daughter who then throws the ball away to the family's dismay

media.headline: Skaggs fans Davis
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Skaggs fans Davis for his first strikeout
media.bigblurb: Tyler Skaggs strikes out Rajai Davis to collect his first strikeout of the 2017 season in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Pujols' RBI groundout
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Escobar scores on Pujols' groundout
media.bigblurb: Albert Pujols grounds out to second base, allowing Yunel Escobar to score to give the Angels a 1-0 lead in the top of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Cron's running catch
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Cron ranges into shallow right for nice grab
media.bigblurb: C.J. Cron makes a nice over-the-shoulder catch in shallow right field to retire Josh Phegley in the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Davis' sacrifice fly
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Davis lifts a sacrifice fly to right field
media.bigblurb: Khris Davis knocks a sacrifice fly to right field to score Marcus Semien and give the Athletics a 2-1 lead in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Triggs' solid start
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Triggs holds Angels to one unearned run
media.bigblurb: Andrew Triggs gives up one unearned run over 5 2/3 solid innings, allowing four hits and three walks with one strikeout vs. the Angels

media.headline: Triggs fans Pujols
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Triggs fans Pujols for his first strikeout
media.bigblurb: Andrew Triggs gets his first strikeout of the season by fanning Albert Pujols in the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Bob Melvin on A's win
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Melvin talks about win over the Angels
media.bigblurb: A's skipper Bob Melvin discusses Andrew Triggs' start, Ryon Healy's second home run of the season in win over the Angels.

media.headline: Scioscia on loss to the A's
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Mike Scioscia on the pitching in loss to A's
media.bigblurb: Angels manager Mike Scioscia talks about players evolving, developing and extending later into games during the loss to the A's

media.headline: Recap: LAA 1, OAK 5
media.blurb: 4/6/17: Healy's two-run homer powers A's to 5-1 win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Ryon Healy hit a two-run homer and Andrew Triggs delivered a solid outing to help lift the Athletics, 5-1, over the Angels
